name: Motorbikes Puzzle Free
description:
Do you like the roar of a motorcycle? Motorbike puzzle gives you a nice selection of pictures of powerful motorcycles which you can turn into nice puzzles. Pick a picture from the gallery, choose your difficulty level and enjoy the puzzle.
If you can't find your picture in our selection, pick one from your device or take a picture with your camera and turn it into a jigsaw puzzle.
As soon as you are done with the pieces you can share your result with your friends or challenge someone else to solve it faster. You can also set the picture as a wallpaper to have it on your display and enjoy the bike on your device.

Our gallery contains the following motorbikes:
• 2000 BMW R1200C
• 2013 Yamaha Road Star Silverado S
• 2014 Yamaha XT250
• agusta 910r
• Aprilia Dorsoduro 1200
• Aprilia RSV4 r
• Aprilia RSV 1000 r
• Aprilia Shiver 750 my10
• Aprilia Tuono 1000
• BMW concept
• BMW K1200s
• BMW K1300r
• BMW R1100s
• BMW R1150r
• Carbon chopper
• Ducati 848 Evo 2012
• Ducati 1098
• Harley Davidson Softail custom
• Harley Davidson Sportster 1200
• Harley Sportster 1200r
• Kawasaki Ninja ZX 6r
• Kawasaki ZZR 1400
• MV Agusta F4
• Suzuki R GSX
• Yamaha V Star 1300 2012
• Yamaha XVS1300a
• Yamaha YZF R1
…and others

The features of our puzzle:
• It is not required to have internet access to play the puzzle game (works in offline mode)
• Many nice high definition pictures sorted in a cute gallery
• Lots of difficulty levels
• Smooth game-play. (Uses the hardware acceleration of the device.)
• Game timer.
• Share result/picture.
• Multitouch zoom and piece rotation
• Zoom In / Out.
• Piece rotation.
• Save game.
• Best score statistics.
• Set picture as wallpaper.
• Nice background music. ("Fire Walking" by Tim Mcmorris)
• Magical sound effects.
• Vibration when pieces merge.
• Kids mode
• The Motorbikes puzzle is free.
